title: Assemble Multi-Layer Insulation (MLI)
description: A technician is assembling MLI blankets to provide thermal protection for a satellite.

tasks.description: Cut the multiple layers of reflective material (e.g., Mylar) and separator netting to the correct size based on a template.
Stack the layers in the correct sequence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assembles the layers in the specified order.

tasks.description: Sew the edges of the blanket together and add grounding straps as required by the design.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the fabrication of the MLI blanket.
